sentences.en: 'sonny's dead, they got him at the Jones Beach toll. "
sentences.cn: “ 桑儿给打死了, 地点在琼斯滩堤道收费站. ”

sentences.en: "It's almost eight o'clock." As if on cue the bell in the chapel began to toll for Matins.
sentences.cn: “快8点了。”恰好在这时小教堂晨祷的钟声敲响了。

sentences.en: After six weeks of uncertainty , the strain was beginning to take its toll.
sentences.cn: 6个星期的忐忑不安后, 压力开始产生影响了.

sentences.en: Although we started with six hens, they began to take their toll.
sentences.cn: 我们起初有六只母鸡, 但后来开始减少.

sentences.en: Call our customer-service staff toll-free.
sentences.cn: 免费拨打我们的客服电话。

sentences.en: Church bells tolled and black flags fluttered.
sentences.cn: 教堂丧钟敲响了，黑旗飘动着。

sentences.en: Clarke says his team could have lasted another 15 days before fatigue would have begun to take a toll.
sentences.cn: 克拉克说，他的团队本来还可以再坚持15天，只是疲劳可能会造成严重后果，只好作罢。

sentences.en: Higher fuel prices took their toll.
sentences.cn: 燃料提价产生了恶果。

sentences.en: Most people who drive the toll roads don't use them every day.
sentences.cn: 大部分开车上收费公路的人不是每天都走公路。

sentences.en: That battle took a heavy toll of the Taiping troops for they were attacked front and rear.
sentences.cn: 那次战役太平军因腹背受敌,伤亡惨重.

sentences.en: The bombings took a heavy toll , killing hundreds of Londoners.
sentences.cn: 轰炸造成严重伤亡，有几百名伦敦人丧生。

sentences.en: The death toll has risen to 83.
sentences.cn: 死亡人数已上升到83人。

sentences.en: The hailstone took a heavy toll of the crops in our village last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚那场冰雹损坏了我们村的庄稼.

sentences.en: The strain of a violent ground campaign will exact a toll on troops.
sentences.cn: 激烈的地面战役带来的紧张压力将让军队付出代价。

sentences.en: The toll collector still had not appeared.
sentences.cn: 那个收费员仍然不见影子.

sentences.en: There are fears that the casualty toll may be higher.
sentences.cn: 有人担心伤亡总数可能会更高。

sentences.en: This has taken a great toll on me personally and professionally.
sentences.cn: 这给我的个人生活和我的工作都造成了严重的不良影响。

sentences.en: Winter takes its toll on your health.
sentences.cn: 冬天对健康不利。

sentences.en: years of pumping iron have taken their toll on his body.
sentences.cn: 多年举重使他的身体受到伤害。

sentences.en: You can pay a toll to drive on Pike's Peak Highway or relax and take the Pike's Peak Cog Railway.
sentences.cn: 你可以付通行费开车上派克斯峰公路，或者放松一下，乘坐派克斯峰齿轨式火车。

sentences.en: You have to pay a toll to drive on a turnpike.
sentences.cn: 在收费公路上开车要缴通行税.

words.tran_cn: 鸣钟人；征收通行税的人；钟
关卡；征收通行税的关卡

phrases.tran_cn: 产生负面影响；造成损失

phrases.phrase: take its toll (或 take a heavy toll)

phrases.tran_cn: 免费通行；受话方付费电话
收费场站，收费广场；缴费广场

trans.tran_cn: 通行费，伤亡人数；损坏；破坏，钟声，长途电话费
trans.tran_en: the number of people killed or injured in a particular accident, by a particular illness etc

trans.tran_cn: 鸣钟；（使）缓慢而反复地鸣响，敲钟
trans.tran_en: if a large bell tolls, or if you toll it, it keeps ringing slowly, especially to show that someone has died
if a large bell tolls, or if you toll it, it keeps ringing slowly, especially to show that someone has died
